allow: Bash(ssh root@server.godsapp.de "docker exec -it konfi-quest-db-1 psql -U konfi_user -d konfi_db -c ""SELECT id, name, waitlist_enabled, max_waitlist_size, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM event_bookings WHERE event_id = events.id AND status = ''pending'') as pending_count FROM events WHERE organization_id = 1 LIMIT 5;""")

Bash(ssh root@server.godsapp.de "docker exec -it konfi-quest_postgres_1 psql -U konfi_user -d konfi_db -c ""SELECT id, name, waitlist_enabled, max_waitlist_size, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM event_bookings WHERE event_id = events.id AND status = ''pending'') as pending_count FROM events WHERE organization_id = 1 ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;""")

Bash(ssh root@server.godsapp.de "docker exec konfi-quest_postgres_1 psql -U konfi_user -d konfi_db -c ""SELECT id, name, waitlist_enabled, max_waitlist_size, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM event_bookings WHERE event_id = events.id AND status = ''pending'') as pending_count FROM events WHERE organization_id = 1 ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;""")
Bash(ssh root@server.godsapp.de "cd /opt/Konfi-Quest && git pull && docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d --build")
